definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...

sentences.english: The results of this study showed that most participants reacted favorably to Shadowing.
sentences.chinese: 研究成果显示大多数的研究参与者对跟述持正向反应。

sentences.english: The thunderstorm is moving to the northeast (northeastward).
Their ship is bearing down on the shore.
sentences.chinese: 他们的船正向河岸疾驶。

sentences.english: The fugitive is believed to be headed for the Canadian border.
sentences.chinese: 据信，逃亡者正向加拿大边界方向逃窜。

sentences.english: Now that future looms before us.
sentences.chinese: 既然未来正向我们迫近。

sentences.english: The fires were spreading in all directions in the dry conditions.
sentences.chinese: 大火在干燥的天气下正向四面八方蔓延。

sentences.english: The part-time boy is leafleting to the people passing by.
sentences.chinese: 那个工读生正向路过的人发传单。

sentences.english: The host Lee Sheung Ching learnt to cook Vietnamese spring rolls.
sentences.chinese: 主持李尚正向当地厨师赐教，学煑越式春卷。

sentences.english: Nowadays the electronic system is swift developing to the high speed and miniaturized direction.
sentences.chinese: 当今电子系统正向高速化和小型化方向飞速发展。

sentences.english: Qinghua , please open your door, I'm running to you now.
sentences.chinese: 清华，请打开你的门，我现在正向你跑去。

sentences.english: The world is marching toward brightness and progress.
sentences.chinese: 世界正向着光明和进步的目标迈进。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the positive regulation of lycium barbarum polysaccharide on immunofunction.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨枸杞多糖对小鼠免疫功能的正向调节作用。

sentences.english: The Impact of Sex-Positive Approach Courses on College Students´. Sexual Values and Attitudes …
sentences.chinese: “正向”性教育课程对于大学生性观念和态度的影响。

sentences.english: Variations of the granule's strength versus above operation parameters were non-monotone, and that versus the nozzle air pressure was consistent.
sentences.chinese: 但喷嘴雾化空气压力与颗粒强度之间存在正向相关性。

sentences.english: They are reverting toward the average .
sentences.chinese: 他们正向平均水平后退。

sentences.english: The nursing students tented to have a positive attitude towards computers.
sentences.chinese: 护生对电脑的态度是正向的。

definition: to change direction/fig. to change one's stance
to get lost/to lose one's way
